item.title: Asciidoc Test
item.description: Sunset from articles/asciidoc-test/` local directory Asciidoctor Demo Footnotes fnote1.[1] (fnote1.footnote:one\[Text footnote n°1 blabla]) fnote2.[2] (fnote2.footnote:\[Text of footnote n° 2 blablabla]) fnote3.[1] (fnote3.footnote:one\[]) Abbreviations include command coded: include::acronymns.txt[] containing: :afaik: pass:[<abbr title="As far as I know">AFAIK</abbr>] :hateoas: pass:[<abbr title="Hypermedia as the Engine of Application State ">HATEOAS</abbr>] :html: pass:[<abbr title="HyperText Markup Language">HTML</abbr>] ... AFAIK HTML is a publishing language. IMHO or IMHO it’s non case-sensitive. HATEOAS REST RGPD en français GDPR in english
